Title: We need to stop asking kids what they want to be when they grow up. As a former college teacher, here's what I'm doing with my teens instead.
Description:
Teens don't have the life experience, self-awareness, or maturity to make a major decision like choosing a career.
We need to stop pressuring them to try.
